title: Urban Future (Volume 1)
author: Nick Land
description: A philosophical book about urban modernity, urban evolution, and technological progress. Land sees cities not merely as concentrations of people but as quasi-superorganisms that are driving mankind toward its evolutionary destiny.

title: Outsideness: 2013-2023
author: Nick Land
description: A collection of Land's best tweets and threads from his Twitter account (@Outsideness) which he used avidly from 2013 until 2023, presented chronologically.
